name: The Green Medusa
description: The hypnotic image of Medusa suggests the risks and dangers contained in the seduction of the female figure who awakens desires for life and is capable of mortally wounding anyone who is seduced by her. This Green Gorgon is a work of art that evokes the 'femme fatale' as much as the 'bête noire' persona - both in its beauty and in its beast aspects. A gorgeous and naïve maiden. A dangerous and challenging woman. In short, it is a mask with a body to be unveiled.
